replies.title: Premium product
replies.content: This is a premium product. Please submit a support ticket.

replies.title: Conflict test
replies.content: This sounds like a plugin conflict. Have you tired a conflict test?

replies.title: Legacy Views Unsupported
replies.content: Hi {{name}}, Unfortunately you are using our Legacy views which we do not provide support anymore due to bugs like these that are complicated for us to track down and fix. https://evnt.is/v1-removal Please take a look at this particular article about why we are no longer supporting that version of our codebase. If you switch to the Updated Views and the problem continues, I would love to to try to help you get to the bottom of the problem Best Regards,
